subject: [MEF Project] Job Application for Interpreter role - Ms. Nhu
body:
Dear Ms.Nhu,

Thank you for taking the time to meet with us for the Interpreter role at
MEF office.

It was a pleasure to meet you and learn more about your skills and
accomplishments. We have now had the opportunity to consider all the
candidates and regret to inform you that on this occasion we have decided
to not further your application.

This decision has been tough as the overall standard of the candidates has
been high. Now that we've had the chance to get to know more about you we
will keep your CV on file for future openings that better fit your profile.

If you would like more feedback regarding the application or the interview
process, we would be more than happy to provide any further information.

Thank you again for your interest in the MEF Project. We wish you every
success in your job search and career.

Sincerely,

MEF office

Congratulations!
We are pleased to confirm that you have been offered for Business Secretary Position of EQ LOGIS CO., LTD.

subject: [KC-TQ] ThÃ´ng bÃ¡o v.v "Uá»‘ng bá»• sung Vitamin A - NH 2023-2024"
body:
*KÃ­nh gá»­i QuÃ½ Phá»¥ Huynh,*

Há»‡ thá»‘ng TrÆ°á»ng Máº§m non Quá»‘c táº¿ Kindy City â€“ CS TÃ¢n Quy xin trÃ¢n trá»ng kÃ­nh
chÃ o QuÃ½ Phá»¥ huynh.

NhÃ  trÆ°á»ng kÃ­nh thÃ´ng bÃ¡o vá» viá»‡c â€œUá»‘ng  bá»•  sung  Vitamin  A  - NH
2023-2024â€ dÃ nh  cho  Há»c  sinh  tá»«  18 Ä‘áº¿n  35 thÃ¡ng theo ná»™i dung Ä‘Ã­nh
kÃ¨m.

KÃ­nh chÃºc QuÃ½ phá»¥ huynh vÃ  gia Ä‘Ã¬nh nhiá»u sÆ°Ìc khoÌ‰e, niá»m vui.

Khi QuÃ½ Phá»¥ huynh cáº§n thÃªm thÃ´ng tin, vui lÃ²ng liÃªn há»‡ vÆ¡iâ€™ nhÃ  trÆ°á»ng qua
sá»‘ Ä‘iá»‡n thoáº¡i 028.36362788  â€“ Ext: 0.

TrÃ¢n trá»ng,

TRÆ¯á»œNG  MNQT KINDY CITY

CS  TÃ‚N  QUY


*ANNOUNCEMENT*

Ref: Take Vitamin A supplements â€“ School year 2023-2024



*Dear Parents,*



According to the health care plan for students of *Kindy City International
Preschool* - Tan Quy campus announces Vitamin A supplementation as follows:


*Purpose*: To prevent Vitamin A deficiency in children, especially children
age 06 to 35 months, the Ministry of Health organizes intaking vitamin A in
June and December each year.



 *Students taking Vitamin A at school:  *Koala Students (from 18 to 35
months old)

*Type of medicine used:*  200,000 units

*Time:*  Thursday morning, June 06th, 2024



The Ministry of Health recommends that the frequency of using Vitamin A
supplements is 6 (six) months apart. Therefore, parents need to be careful
to only take it once per session. You need to notify the medical staff if
your child has already been given medicine from January 1, 2024 - June 5,
2024.



Thank you for your attention.

Best Regards!

*BOARD OF MANAGEMENT *

*KINDY CITY INTERNATIONAL PRESCHOOL *

*TÃ‚N  QUY CAMPUS*

We are a company that uses seaweed to make products for Animal Feed.

Dear Person in Charge,

Hello, Sir or Madam,

I hople all is well with you.

I am Choi, Hyeok-Soon, manager ofoverseas business department in ECO-HOPIA Co.,Ltd. in south Korea.

ECO-HOPIA C., Ltd. is a manufacturer of composed organic premium fertilizer and bio energy (bio soild fuel andbio gas) by using organic 
waste. ECO-HOPIA has the most advanced technology to treat organic waste. Throughour advanced technology, 100% recycling of organic waste resources is possible. For more detailed informationof our company, please refer to the attached company introduction.

I am writing to this email to introduce our company and propose our business model related to organic farm toyou. Actually, The business model that best suits your company is 1st business model. As regard this, pleasecheck the attached our business proposal. However, if you look at our proposal, each business model can besuccessful on its own, but if developed in conjunction, it can create greater sysnergy eff ect in Vietnam.

Currently we are carrying out many government supported projects to enter the Vietnamese market. Accordingto this, we plan to visit Vienam from July 2nd to 4th. If you are interested in collaboration with us, we would liketto have a meeting during that period. If you donâ€™t mind, please let me know the availabe date and time.

I apologize for sending you this email so suddenly, and I hope to see you in Vietnam.

I am looking forward to your reply.

Thanks and all the best,

Choi.

Mr. Choi, Hyeoksoon
Manager of Overseas Business Department
ECO-HOPIA Co., Ltd.

Dear Applicant,
Greetings from the 2025 King Sejong Institute Korean Language Teacher
Training Program Team.

Thank you sincerely for your interest in our program.
Unfortunately, we regret to inform you that you have not been selected as a
final trainee for the 2025 King Sejong Institute Korean Language Teacher
Training Program.

All applications were thoroughly reviewed based on the submitted documents
and eligibility requirements. The final decisions were made with careful
consideration of each applicant's qualifications and potential.

â€» If you have any inquiries regarding the selection results, please send an
email with the subject line formatted as follows:

number of spots available,
we are unable to provide individual feedback on application results.
â€» Please note that replies to this email will not be received.

below:
Email: ktc@ksif.or.kr

Thank you once again for your valuable application.
We hope you will continue to take interest in the various programs offered
by the King Sejong Institute.

Sincerely,
King Sejong Institute Korean Language Teacher Training Program Team
